alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 6:11PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL NATRONA AND EAST CENTRAL FREMONT COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM MDT... At 611 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Castle Gardens, which is also 24 miles southeast of Shoshoni, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Natrona and east central Fremont Counties, including the following locations... Arminto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Wind River Basin
